title: Seattle Health Information Management Association
description: Welcome! We are a dedicated group of volunteers working to ensure that the Seattle Health Information Management community has access to a network of professionals, engaging workshops and scholarships.

subsections.subTitle: Become a member
subsections.subDesc: Join as a 2024 SHIMA member today.

subsections.subTitle: Benefits
subText: Inexpensive Continuing Education Units (CEUs) to maintain your professional certification
stay up-to-date on information management and informatics

subsections.subTitle: Eligibility
subText: Current and future professionals interested in the intersection between people, data and technology
Professionals working formally or informally in a Health Information Management (HIM) or healthcare informatics role

subSubSection.name: Opportunities
subSubSection.description: Host workshops, panel disscussions, speakers, and create networking opportunities.

subSubSection.name: Scholarships
subSubSection.description: Provide Undergraduate and Graduate Scholarships for Health Information Management and Informatics students.

subSubSection.name: Membership
subSubSection.description: Provide professional exam fee reimbursement for the AHIMA credentials.
